WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception about how filters work
WorkItem.Description:
i searched but nobody seems to have this same problem.
Rawr is functioning ok: it loads my character in less than a minute and calculates everything perfectly, but if i want to look for an optimizer, or the best in slot... there are no items to choose except for those I already have equipped on my character.

Comments.Message: if that doesn't work, reload the default Item Cache.
there are no filters activated... i choose to see ALL items... but there are none

You mean you unchecked evry filter? You need those to see items..

Click the reset button at the top of the filter tree

when i filter something i EXLUDE something. my filters were on default so there were no items EXCLUDED from the list.
anyway i resolved following Hinalover's suggestion and reset the item cache.
